Summary: silent and low enough to hear if it was conventional
divs: Sighting Detailswalked out side looked up at a clear sky. lightred object not moving. then started to move upword. Then moved over me at about 1400 ft. Blinked like plane but silent. This was at 17 mile and Utica rd. Please e-mail me if someone else seen this. This was very very strange!!!!!!
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around November 2nd 2007
